rare.name: BOMB DIFFUSAL BOOTS
rare.description: When you damage yourself with [Helix Rocket], it knocks you back 200% further.

epic.name: ENDGAME EQUALIZER
epic.description: When you spend your Ultimate Charge, reset all cooldowns. While [Tactical Visor] is active, gain 20% Cooldown Reduction.

epic.name: RAPID RESPONSE RADIUS
epic.description: [Biotic Field] heals allies below 50% Life 10% more.

epic.name: IRON LUNG
epic.description: While using [Sprint], gain Overhealth equal to 5% of your max Life every 1s, up to 25%, for 5s.

powers.title: PERIPHERAL PULSE
powers.description: During [Tactical Visor], [Pulse Rifle] shoots at 1 additional enemy, dealing 50% damage.

powers.title: SUPER VISOR
powers.description: After using [Helix Rocket], activate [Tactical Visor] for 0.75s.

powers.title: CHAINGUN
powers.description: While continuously shooting [Pulse Rifle], each shot grants 0.5% Weapon Power, stacking up to 100 times.

powers.title: MAN ON THE RUN
powers.description: During [Sprint], restore 10% of your Ammo every Is and increase your Max Ammo by 10% until you reload, stacking up to 10 times.

powers.title: CRATERED
powers.description: Increase [Helix Rocket] explosion radius by 40% and explosion damage by 25%.

powers.title: DOUBLE HELIX
powers.description: [Helix Rocket] fires a second homing [Helix Rocket] that deals 70% reduced damage.

powers.title: HUNKER DOWN
powers.description: When [Helix Rocket] deals damage, create a [Biotic Field] with a reduced duration at your position.

powers.title: BACK OFF
powers.description: Enemies within your [Biotic Field] take damage equal to 100% of its healing output.

powers.title: BIOTIC BULLSEYE
powers.description: While in [Biotic Field], critical hits restore 5% Max Ammo and extend the duration of [Biotic Field] by 0.5s, up to 5s.

powers.title: FRONTLINERS
powers.description: Allies in range of your [Biotic Field] when it spawns gain Overhealth equal to 30% of your max Life for 3s.

powers.title: ON ME!
powers.description: [Biotic Field] moves with you and grants you 20% increased Max Life while active.
